meanings.sent1: The unscaled mountain peak looked daunting.
meanings.sent2: The hikers avoided the unscaled cliffs due to safety concerns.
meanings.sent3: The unscaled mountain seemed to challenge the climbers to conquer it.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of heights made the unscaled summit seem unreachable.
meanings.sent5: The unscaled cliff face loomed above them, casting a shadow over their path.

meanings.definition: Not measured or determined in size or extent
meanings.sent1: The unscaled map left them lost in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The unscaled dimensions of the room made it hard to plan furniture placement.
meanings.sent3: His unscaled estimate of the distance led to a longer hike than expected.
meanings.sent4: The unscaled project scope caused delays in completion.
meanings.sent5: The unscaled area of the field made it difficult to estimate the planting time needed.

meanings.definition: Not removed or cleared of scales
meanings.sent1: The unscaled fish still had its shimmering scales intact.
meanings.sent2: The unscaled reptile slithered away into the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The unscaled fish looked like a sparkling jewel in the water.
meanings.sent4: The unscaled lizard basked in the sun, its scales glistening.
meanings.sent5: The unscaled snake moved gracefully through the grass, its scales reflecting the sunlight.
